data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the The Bottlery.
The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
The murderer is here.

You are carrying a scepter.

data.short_motivation: I am symbolically informing him that I have passed a death sentence on him (the hug of death)
data.mid_motivation: I will be leaving my country with one less murderer after the execution is carried out in a few days time
data.long_motivation: I will ensure the felons in my country are picked off one by one until they are all gone.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the corner of the bottlery where the murderer is
